about_the_game: This demo lets you sample STREAM or DIE! and the intriguing world of WISH.
detailed_description: This demo lets you sample STREAM or DIE! and the intriguing world of WISH.
name: Stream or Die! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Conteúdo sexual
Atos criminosos

short_description: Become the greatest streamer of all time in STREAM OR DIE! This game is an RPG inside an RPG -- game-ception! Embark on your quest for fame by streaming a wild new MMO - where your choices can rocket you to viral glory or comically seal your doom.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
